entry.title: Today in DeFi - DLN Exchange Live, Celsius to Sell Altcoins, Delta-Neutral Vaults, and more...
entry.summary: DLN Exchange Live DLN, a native cross-chain swap by deBridge, is live. DLN exchanges assets directly without asset wrapping or liquidity pool and offers fast transfers with incentives and without MEV, AMM fees, or slippage. Celsius to Sell Altcoins Celcius

entry.title: Today in DeFi - EigenLayer Mainnet Live, Hashflow Exploit, Borrowing on LSTs, and more...
entry.summary: EigenLayer Mainnet Live ETH re-staking protocol EigenLayer launches stage-1 mainnet on Ethereum. Initially, the protocol supports staking for Lido’s stETH, RocketPool’s rETH, and Coinbase’s cbETH with a 3200 cap for each, for which all pools are now at capacity.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Aevo Public Launch, Uniswap V4, Future Yield Trading, and more...
entry.summary: Aevo Public Launch Options AMM Aevo is now open to the public. Anyone can now trade ETH/BTC options & perps, as well as do OTC trading. Uniswap V4 Coming Uniswap announced V4 with released the early implementation of the code. The new version will enable Hooks, the singleton architecture, Flash Accounting, native ETH for pool operations, and governance updates.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Polygon 2.0, Keep3r Exploit, Stable Yield Pools, and more...
entry.summary: Polygon 2.0 Polygon Labs introduces Polygon 2.0, a set of upgrades to offer scalability and unified liquidity via ZK tech. The team will share more details about the future of Polygon PoS, token evolution, and decentralized governance in the coming weeks.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Optimism Bedrock Live, SEC Sues CEXes, Sturdy Exploit, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of June 5th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - SudoSwap V2, Delorean GNS Yield Market, Staking Incentives, and more...
entry.summary: SudoSwap V2 Live P2P NFT marketplace SudoSwap launches V2. The upgrade brings new features such as on-chain royalties, custom creator settings, EIP-1155 support, etc. Delorean GNS Yield Market Live Arbitrum-based future yield DEX Delorean launches the

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Arbitrum Stopped for an Hour, Hubble Exchange Testnet, Auto-compounding crvUSD Yield, and more...
entry.summary: Arbitrum Stopped for an hour Arbitrum stopped processing transactions for about an hour due to a bug found in the batch poster. The bug hit and paused the Sequencer to finalize transaction ordering on-chain. Arbitrum team has fixed the bug and resumed network operation.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Optimism Bedrock Live, SEC Sues Coinbase, Upgraded Options Trading, and more...
entry.summary: Optimsim Bedrock Live Optimism has upgraded to Bedrock. The upgrade enables lower fees, shorter deposit times, and improved modularity & performance. SEC Sues Coinabse The SEC sued Coinbase after Binance for operating as an unregistered exchange and broker, and that 13 assets listed on Coinbase were considered crypto asset securities.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - SEC Sues Binance, Raft Live, Low-interest Loans for LSDs, and more...
entry.summary: SEC Sues Binance The SEC sued crypto Binance and its founder CZ, alleging that they violated securities laws of the US. Binance later published a response to SEC’s complaint. Raft Live Raft Finance, a lending protocol for LSTs, is live. Raft initially supports the stETH market and allows users to borrow R stablecoin against stETH.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Trader Joe Auto-Pools Live, EU MiCA signed, Multichain Back Online(?), and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of May 29th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Uniswap Votes Against Protocol Fees, RocketPool on zkSync, Easy Uni v3 LPing, and more...
entry.summary: Uniswap DAO Voted Against Protocol Fees The Uniswap DAO voted for zero protocol fees on the GFX Lab’s fee switch proposal. Uniswap's executive director tweeted that the vote is only for gathering feedback and the DAO “will use the polling data to propose a formal Temperate Check”

entry.title: Today in DeFi - unshETH Private Key Leak, EU MiCA Singed, Perps Trading on Polygon zkEVM, and more...
entry.summary: unshETH Private Key Leak One of unshETH deployer’s private keys was compromised and some USH farm rewards and protocol liquidity were compromised. The team paused withdrawals on unshETH Ether and is negotiating with the hackers for a return of lost funds worth 375k. User-deposited funds are safe and unaffected.

entry.title: Today in DeFi -One Click DAOs, tBTC on Arbitrum, zkEVM farming and More
entry.summary: One Click DAOs A new project on Aragon called Libree allows users to quickly and easily create Investment DAOs. Users can easily create asset management strategies and assign permissions to wallets managing funds. tBTC on Arbitrum tBTC, a BTC token on Ethereum, is

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Worldcoin Integrates Safe, Tai.Money Live, LST Loans, and more...
entry.summary: Worldcoin Integrates Safe UBI protocol Worldcoin integrates with Safe to offer account abstraction to its users. World App users receive a Safe-powered smart contract wallet deployed on Polygon. Tai.money Live Tai.money, a version of Reflexer’s RAI that supports LSDs as collateral, is live. Users can now borrow TAI against their ETH, wstETH, rETH, cbETH, and RAI; also users can LP for the protocol to earn

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - QuickPerps on Polygon zkEVM, Fantom Gas Monetization, Multichain Routes Paused, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of May 22nd

entry.title: Today in DeFi - QuickPerps Live on Polygon zkEVM, Lyra Upgrade on Optimism, Vote on Protocol Fees, and more...
entry.summary: QuickPerps Live on Polygon zkEVM QuickSwap launches QuickPerps, a perpetual dex that allows trading of $MATIC, $ETH, $BTC, $USDC, $USDT, and $DAI with up to 50x leverage. Lyra Upgrade on Optimsim Lyra launched an improved version of the protocol on Optimism. The new version uses SNX V2 perpetual futures as a liquidity source to delta hedge the option Market Maker Vaults (MMVs). This improves the capital efficiency of the protocol, increases the percentage of fees returned back to LPs, and allows for more assets to be supported for traders.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Multichain Routes Paused, Matcha DEX Upgrade, TWAP Trading, and more...
entry.summary: Multichain Routes Paused Some bridging routes (Kava、zkSync、Polygon zkEVM) on Multichain are paused and some traders’ funds are stuck on the bridges. There are also unconfirmed rumors of the cofounder's arrest in China and an investor sell-off of its token.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Coinbase Cloud WaaS Live, Lukso L1 Live, NFT Loan, and more...
entry.summary: Coinbase Cloud WaaS Live Coinbase Cloud launches Wallet-as-a-Service on the Ethereum mainnet. Coinbase WaaS allows users to manage their wallets using a username & a password, and wallets created with WaaS are secured by multi-party computation (MPC) tech.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Inverse DBR Streaming, Lido Withdrawals UI Live, MEV-less Crosschain Swap, and more...
entry.summary: Inverse DBR Streaming Inverse introduces DBR Streaming, a new utility to INV tokens. Each staked INV will receive an automated, continual stream of DBR. DBRs are tradable borrowing rights used for Inverse’s lending market FiRM Lido Withdrawals UI Live
